title: signal booster
extract: Share (another person's post or other online content) with one's own followers or friends on social media so as to raise awareness of an issue, event, etc. 'we've been getting the word out, signal-boosting their petition, and generally making ourselves useful'
extract_html: Share (another person's post or other online content) with one's own followers or friends on social media so as to raise awareness of an issue, event, etc. 'we've been getting the word out, signal-boosting their petition, and generally making ourselves useful'
